channel.title: Coding problems
channel.description:
[b]Why is coding so hard?![/b]
Hi there, i am new at this and need some info on coding... so if you can help, that would be great!
i have a some example of what i have a lot of trouble on...
*(the more stars there are, the more i need help on)
(*** how do i put teleport commands on the emote tabs?) (**** how do i spawn NPCs? as in, when ppl tele to train, i want the NPCs to respawn in the area they were in) (*** how do i make a wilderness?) (** how do i put bank booths in a specific area?) (*** how do i put shops in?) (*** how do i make teleport commands?)
(and anything else that you might think i will need help with)
Thank You For Helping! ::kidd619::

item.title: Coding problems
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“kidd619, post:1, topic:286759”]Why is coding so hard?!

Hi there, i am new at this and need some info on coding…
so if you can help, that would be great!

i have a some example of what i have a lot of trouble on…

*(the more stars there are, the more i need help on)

(*** how do i put teleport commands on the emote tabs?)
(**** how do i spawn NPCs? as in, when ppl tele to train, i want the NPCs to respawn in the area they were in)
(*** how do i make a wilderness?)
(** how do i put bank booths in a specific area?)
(*** how do i put shops in?)
(*** how do i make teleport commands?)

(and anything else that you might think i will need help with)

Thank You For Helping!
::kidd619::[/quote]
Im bored and got nothing better to do.
Heres a short tutorial.
How do you put teleports in the emote tab. Use texthandler.java
and to make teles work use clickingmost.java

How do i spawn npcs
Use your autospawn.cfg file to spawn
Just copy one of the other codes in the autospawn text and paste it at the bottom of autospawn text. But right before [END OF NPC LIST] or what ever it is and then just change the first numbers you see to and npc id you want.
And next 2 sets of numbers are choords.
Explained that easy as possible lol^^

How do i put bank booths in a specific area?
Go into your client.java
And search makeglobal
If your asking how do i search Push Ctrl + f and type makeglobal or whatever your looking for , methods, commands,ect…

How do i make teleport commands?
Add them under a command.
At first you can use a command generator but i wouldnt reccomend it since you wont learn shit.
How do i make wilderness?
Do you mean safe or wildy?
If you want wildy remove the code telling it to be safezone.

Read full topic

Fix’d.

Seriously though. Try searching on all those subjects.
